Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney

Class MainApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.marinescu.fxmoney.MainApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoanInterface, ShowBalance, UpdateTables
public class MainApplication extends javafx.application.Application implements UpdateTables
This is the main class of the Bank Application. It extends the Application class and implements the UpdateTables interface.

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      Initializes the primary stage of the application.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method launches the application.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments.

    • init

      public void init() throws Exception
      This method initializes the application, checks if the database connection is successful using the DataSource class, and if not, it exits the platform. If the connection is successful, it updates the loans and all tables using the updateLoans and updateAllTables methods.
      Overrides:
      init in class javafx.application.Application
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while initializing the application.

    • stop

      public void stop() throws Exception
      This method stops the application and closes the database connection using the DataSource class.
      Overrides:
      stop in class javafx.application.Application
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while stopping the application.
